hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && git add -A && git commit -m "auto: $(date +%H:%M:%S) update" --no-verify 2>/dev/null || true

cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'next build'; then git add -A && git commit -m "build: $(date +%m-%d\ %H:%M) verified" --no-verify 2>/dev/null; git push --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi
